phrases: Ill be by your side forever
No matter how the future tests us
I was able to meet you
If I am with you, then I can overcome them
Excite me on the contrary, but -
I only want to protect you
We were born in distant worlds
Ill be by your side forever
Let Us change any future into hope
Always, always look at me at all times
You looked away, did not you?
Ill punish those who are wavering and insolent
Because I will not listen to excuses
Touch me because I am tired
I love you, its a lie
I hate you, that is a lie, too
Nay nay nay, its useless, its a misunderstanding
So I will not say, I love you”
Non non non, because I absolutely will not forgive you
If you go to somewhere else
The truth is, I want to be by your side more than anyone else
Let Us go take a walk in chains of love!
So the Silver Advent Festival is your New Year's festival.
We are in the middle of war.
Do the people in the city of South Goth not have any pride,
Not only did the Albion forces not protect their people, but they also ran away with the town's food supply, right?
The Tristain forces gave food to the people in their stead,
Why are you only capable of thinking like that?
What is that supposed to mean?
Well yeah, I am different from aristocrats.
I will go see the Princess by myself!
I do not need a dog following me!
I have given him a task, so I will hear the mission in his stead.
There was something that I wanted to ask Saito-san, but...
The other day, we recovered Saito-san's vehicle from the mountain...
Can it be operated right now?
If it is an order, we will do something about it.
As you know, per Albion's proposal, we will be in a truce during the Silver Advent Festival.
They might attempt a surprise attack.
Therefore, we would like you to fly to the capital, Londinium, and spy on them.
We will be the ones breaking the truce if we use a dragon from our Air Force.
On the other hand, you two can say that you are students if you were to get caught by any chance.
The results from the last mission were pitiful,
but I am sure you two can do fine if it is just scouting.
Julio, I have a favour to ask of you.
I did not ask anything yet.
If it is a favour for my beautiful Louise, I will fulfil it no matter what.
I heard that you are a dragon knight in the Musketeer Force but have not joined Tristain's military, right?
I have not since I am a flamen from Romalia.
Going on a date, of course.
We are off on a secret mission by order of the Princess!
In that case, get on my Zero!
W-Well, I can fix it in a rush.
Besides, you do not want to help out with the war effort, right?
I do not need a familiar who only complains!
I do not care about him.
He will not understand me at all.
Why will not she understand me?
I never imagined I would see you here!
Why are you here in Albion?
The school's closed for a while,
and I have an uncle who is starting a business here,
so I had him bring me with him.
Do not tell me M-Master Scarron is your uncle...
Who are you calling an uncle, huh?
Yes, well, we know each other from the Magic Academy...
Then the boy Siesta said she wanted to look for in Albion,
the great person whom she loves unrequitedly, but wants to get no matter what,
Come to think of it, Miss Valliere is not with you?
Does not look like they are preparing to march out or anything.
Do you guys intend to betray your country?
N-No, we are only saying that we should consider it a possibility.
If we focus on defence, we should be able to withstand them for a while.
However, we lack sufficient force to attack with.
It is no matter how much force we have.
I was able to get some results, but there is no longer any merit in using this country further.
You asked me to take part in this mission for Saito-kun's sake, did not you?
You cannot force a pacifist to go to war and put him in a dangerous situation, right?
I do not care about that dog.
You do not have to blush.
You want Saito-kun to be safe even if you were to die in war.
You care about him so much, but he just does not understand.
That is why you are angry.
Oops, looks like chatting time is over.
Hey, what do you plan on doing?
You will bite your tongue if you talk.
Let us go back, shall we?
How kind of you to worry about their well-being.
I wonder if it is Saito-kun's influence.
But what a surprise that you are the boy that Siesta loves!
I feel bad for Louise, but I think I have to root for my cousin.
Everyone in our family has big breasts.
This is a White Spirit Medal.
It is not much, but I was distinguished on the battlefield.
General Poitier gave it to me in person.
To an aristocrat, there is no greater honour!
Gosh, even when your master's back and all...
You acted coldly to him again, did not you?
And then Partner went away with a bitter face.
I was not being cold to him.
I do not care about him!
He should not talk back to me.
He should just follow the orders I give him.
That is got nothing to do with it!
Partner gave up on going home and joined the war to follow you.
Though he does not want to get involved in it.
Why do you think that is?
Have you ever responded to his feelings, even once?
While he devotes himself to you,
is not whipping the only thing you do to him?
Oh, and I thought I would show her the medal.
Why do not you go call her, then?
Deep down, I am really grateful to him.
But he is my familiar and a man.
Without my having to tell him so every time,
he should understand how I feel.
You are asking for the impossible.
He seems to be lacking in relationship experience.
And if the war continues, and if I were to die in it, he would never understand.
Instead of keeping it inside, why do not you tell him exactly how you feel?
And make a solid bond with him while you are alive.
Make me your bride, make love to me!
You think an aristocrat could say l-love and m-marry me and m-make love to me...
Partner says that in the world he comes from, there are no plebeians nor aristocrats.
That is why he does not understand your standpoint.
Why do not you two swap positions for a day?
Yup, that is a great idea.
You will be able to come to a good understanding if you do.
It is that room, is not it?
Will Saito really be happy with this outfit?
Partner's simple-minded, so he will be emotionally touched to know how much you love him.
You are... y-you are my master tonight!
If you are on the floor in that outfit, you will get lots of customers.
I wondered what you were doing while I was gone.
To tell you the truth, Partner,
S-So you know, it was not for you, okay?!
Stupid Delflinger said that if I wear the cat outfit and say,
You are my master for the night, meow,
I could make Julio fall for me.
He is superior to you in looks, brains and swordsmanship.
Compared to him, you are a pinworm to his lion,
Then enjoy your time with Julio!
Hey, looks like everyone is here.
Hey, who is cuter, Miss Valliere or me?
A maid dares to make fun of me?!
No, I only want Saito-san to be happy.
Ah, stop it, both of you.
Magistrate Sheffield, can we really use the secret measure for repelling the enemy here?
A third of South Gotha's water supply comes from here.
It controls both the living and the dead.
I must have the war continue.
Do the rest as we planned.
I leave Albion in your hands.
Does that mean a cute girl like me?
It happened when we encountered an enemy while marching from Lowscythe.
When I noticed, I was surrounded by enemies in the mountain.
I was surely inflicted a fatal wound.
my body did not have a single scar.
Humans are likely to see strange dreams when they are faced with death.
Either way, I am glad you are alive.
It is frightening to die in war, in an unknown land.
No, no, I am an aristocrat.
I am not afraid of dying.
I can die any time I am asked to for the sake of honour.
But if possible, I would like to be more recognised, so I can die with another medal on me.
I do not get it, but you came back after nearly dying, right?
Dying for the sake of honour?
Honour is more important than life to aristocrats!
How many times do I have to tell you until you understand that?
Why will not you understand me?!
Everything ends when you die no matter how many medals you get!
What is important is loyalty to the Princess.
I do not need anyone to recognise me.
I only need the Princess to understand me.
I would gladly give my life if it is for her!
It was not for Julio, but...
I do not care about Julio!
My true rival for Louise is... the Princess!
I am troubling you, following you all the way to Albion, right?
I was not cold at all to begin with.
I wanted to feel your warmth.
I want a stronger bond, not just one between master and familiar.
Your Highness, there is a revolt!
Some of our own men are assaulting our soldiers!
What ridiculous things are you saying?
You will return to Miss Valliere's side, will not you?
Please take this with you, then.
If Miss Valliere tries to make you do something dangerous,
make her take this, and run away while she is asleep.
It may be natural for aristocrats to die for the Princess,
but I cannot stand having you get caught up in it!
If you want to meet me again next week, then sit tightly and wait!
